topics.body:
Posting a quote I like:
So true. It just shows how when some people are confronted with something new, that threatens their way of thinking, it scares them so they dismiss it but as Shakespeare once wrote "There is no darkness but ignorance."

Pompous Hitch is oversimplifying Rand's work because he misunderstood Rand's definition/use of the word selfishness.

It seems that pomposity is fashionable for insecure teenagers that prefer to fight rather than analyse. How barbaric.ï»¿


Although I still disagree with Rand, most of the people who do disagree with her don't know jack.
